title: What to Watch for in Tuesday’s Democratic Debate
text:
Democratic presidential hopefuls will gather in Westerville, Ohio, Tuesday for their fourth primary debate, where 12 candidates, the largest slate in modern history, are likely to see several Trump administration controversies on the agenda.

The debate—with the 10 candidates who appeared last month in Houston plus Rep. Tulsi Gabbard of Hawaii and billionaire Tom Steyer—is the first since Democrats launched an impeachment inquiry of President Trump stemming in large part from his attempt to get Ukraine to investigate one of...
description: Democratic presidential hopefuls will gather in Westerville, Ohio, on Tuesday, and controversies about President Trump are likely to be a big part of the agenda.
